com.mrcrayfish.device.api.utils

Class OnlineRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mrcrayfish.device.api.utils.OnlineRequest

  • public class OnlineRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    OnlineRequest is a simple built in request system for handling URL connections. It runs in the background so it doesn't freeze the user interface of your application. All requests are returned with a string, use how you please!

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  OnlineRequest.ResponseHandler

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static OnlineRequest getInstance()
        Gets a singleton instance of OnlineRequest. Use this instance to start making requests.
        Returns:
        the singleton OnlineRequest object

      • make

        public void make(java.lang.String url,
                 OnlineRequest.ResponseHandler handler)
        Adds a request to the queue. Use the handler to process the response you get from the URL connection.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL you want to make a request to
        handler - the response handler for the request
